title: DNS
subject: Computer Networks
theory:
Phonebook of the internet. Translates `google.com` -> `142.250.x.x`. 
Uses UDP Port 53. 
Hierarchy: Root (.) -> TLD (.com) -> Domain (google).

examples.code:
User types google.com
1. Check Local Cache.
2. Ask ISP DNS.
3. Ask Root Server.
4. Ask .com Server... IP returned.

common_mistakes.correction: DNS only gives the IP. The Browser then calls that IP for the page.

interview_questions.question: What is A Record vs CNAME?
interview_questions.answer: A Record maps Name -> IP. CNAME maps Name -> Name (Alias).
